Build 20020129

1) Started with a project (a plugin with source) that was in sync
2) In the filesystem, I slammed the project contents, replacing with a binary 
version of the same plugin (so most files/folders in the projects are replaced
3) In the navigator, refreshed from local

Now, whenever I try to do anything CVS-related on this project, I get internal 
errors (for example, when I do CVS->Synchronize).  Here is a sample from the log 
file:
